ModMetaData.name: Research Engine SK
ModMetaData.author: Skyarkhangel
ModMetaData.description:
[English]
Combined version of two great mods into great one: Research Tree (v.A12) by Fluffy and CCL Help system by E (v.A14).
[Russian]
Комбинированная версия двух великих модов: 'Research Tree' (Дерево исследований) (v.A12) от Fluffy и 'CCL Help system' от E (v.A14).
